name: Donut Dogfights: Bagel Base Bombardment
description:
After marauded by the Bagels when their sprinkle cannons proved useless, a rebellious group of donuts devised a special ship made in their image to turn the tides by throwing the Bagels' weapons, and even their ships, right back at them.

Asteroids-like controls, except that shooting is done after a charging period when you absorb an enemy bullet or ship in the blue bar in the middle of your ship. The more you absorb before firing, the bigger and faster your bullet will be.

My first game outside summer camps, my first project with Godot, and made for my first Game Jam, the Sky mini jam. This one's hitting some boxes! Hopefully I checked the "fun" box, too.
